custom-sql.sql: SELECT pml_organization_external.* FROM pml_organization_external WHERE (lower(orgexternalcode) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(orgexternalname) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM pml_organization_external WHERE (lower(orgexternalcode) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(orgexternalname) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
